name: Sueño - 3D Puzzle Adventure Game
description:
A 3D puzzle adventure game created for a university project.

Story: Our character wakes up in a place that he don't recognise. He tries to solve the puzzles to reach to the next one, until he learns that he is trapped in his dream.

Coder: Ömer Faruk Akyüz (me)

Story: Kadir Bircan Yeten

Level Design: Fatih Gür

UI & Audio: Ömer Değer
